guidance: Explain clearly which information does not match
Do not assume which information is correct
Ask the supplier to confirm the correct details
Request updated documentation if required
Do not proceed with verification until confirmation is received
Inform the supplier that a duplicate profile exists
Provide the Graphite ID and legal name
Ask which profile should remain active
Request confirmation of the registration number
Do not merge profiles without explicit confirmation

bank_approval_pending.case_name: Bank approval pending and approver has access
guidance: Explain that bank approval must be completed by a second admin user
Clarify that the current user cannot approve their own bank details
Create blank space or placeholder in the email for the name and email of the approver
Explain that the approver should log in to graphiteConnect with their email address. Otherwise, the task cannot be completed

bank_approval_pending_invitation_sent.case_name: Bank approval pending and invitation sent to supplier
guidance: Explain that bank approval must be completed by a second admin user
Clarify that the current user cannot approve their own bank details
Create blank space or placeholder in the email for the name and email of the approver
Explain that an invitation has been sent to the approver inbox or spam
Explain that the invitation creates login credentials for the approver
Clarify that the invitation comes from no-reply@graphiteconnect.com

bank_approval_no_second_user.case_name: There is no second user to approve
guidance: Explain that bank approval must be completed by a second admin user
Clarify that the current user cannot approve their own bank details
Explain how to add a second user
Request to set up banking permissions for the second user
Guide how to complete the bank approval task
Explain that the supplier has added the bank account, but they have not shared it with the customer
Create steps for supplier to log in to graphiteConnect, click on view profile, click on banking center, and share the bank account by clicking on manage sharing
Clarify that after the bank account is shared, the customer will have visibility of the bank account as normal
